page.title: 13Television radio & music
page.content:
{** Music **}Peoples tastes in music included 'pop'classical and rock gospel. most enjoyed listening or attending concerts or discos. Most did not want more discos in Stansted though.
{** TELEVISION **}People watched televison from two to four hours a day. Films were the most popular type of programme. { {** RADIO **}People enjoyed listening to the radio from about half an hour to two hours a day. Radio 4 was most popular. This includes documentaries discussions and current affairs.
